26namespace HeapProfilerAgentState {
27static const char heapProfilerEnabled[] = "heapProfilerEnabled";
28static const char heapObjectsTrackingEnabled[] = "heapObjectsTrackingEnabled";
29static const char allocationTrackingEnabled[] = "allocationTrackingEnabled";
30static const char samplingHeapProfilerEnabled[] = "samplingHeapProfilerEnabled";
31static const char samplingHeapProfilerInterval[] =
32 "samplingHeapProfilerInterval";
33static const char samplingHeapProfilerFlags[] = "samplingHeapProfilerFlags";
34} // namespace HeapProfilerAgentState
35
36class HeapSnapshotProgress final : public v8::ActivityControl {
37 public:
38 explicit HeapSnapshotProgress(protocol::HeapProfiler::Frontend* frontend)
39 : m_frontend(frontend) {}
40 ControlOption ReportProgressValue(uint32_t done, uint32_t total) override {
41 m_frontend->reportHeapSnapshotProgress(done, total,
42 protocol::Maybe<bool>());
43 if (done >= total) {
44 m_frontend->reportHeapSnapshotProgress(total, total, true);
45 }
46 m_frontend->flush();
47 return kContinue;
48 }
49
50 private:
51 protocol::HeapProfiler::Frontend* m_frontend;
52};
53
54class GlobalObjectNameResolver final
55 : public v8::HeapProfiler::ObjectNameResolver {
56 public:
57 explicit GlobalObjectNameResolver(V8InspectorSessionImpl* session)
58 : m_offset(0), m_strings(10000), m_session(session) {}
59
60 const char* GetName(v8::Local<v8::Object> object) override {
61 v8::Local<v8::Context> creationContext;
62 if (!object->GetCreationContext().ToLocal(&creationContext)) {
63 return "";
64 }
65 InspectedContext* context = m_session->inspector()->getContext(
66 m_session->contextGroupId(),
67 InspectedContext::contextId(creationContext));
68 if (!context) return "";
69 String16 name = context->origin();
70 size_t length = name.length();
71 if (m_offset + length + 1 >= m_strings.size()) return "";
72 for (size_t i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
73 UChar ch = name[i];
74 m_strings[m_offset + i] = ch > 0xFF ? '?' : static_cast<char>(ch);
75 }
76 m_strings[m_offset + length] = '\0';
77 char* result = &*m_strings.begin() + m_offset;
78 m_offset += length + 1;
79 return result;
80 }
81
82 private:
83 size_t m_offset;
84 std::vector<char> m_strings;
85 V8InspectorSessionImpl* m_session;
86};
87
88class HeapSnapshotOutputStream final : public v8::OutputStream {
89 public:
90 explicit HeapSnapshotOutputStream(protocol::HeapProfiler::Frontend* frontend)
91 : m_frontend(frontend) {}
92 void EndOfStream() override {}
93 int GetChunkSize() override { return 102400; }
94 WriteResult WriteAsciiChunk(char* data, int size) override {
95 m_frontend->addHeapSnapshotChunk(String16(data, size));
96 m_frontend->flush();
97 return kContinue;
98 }
99
100 private:
101 protocol::HeapProfiler::Frontend* m_frontend;
102};
103
104v8::Local<v8::Object> objectByHeapObjectId(v8::Isolate* isolate, int id) {
105 v8::HeapProfiler* profiler = isolate->GetHeapProfiler();
106 v8::Local<v8::Value> value = profiler->FindObjectById(id);
107 if (value.IsEmpty() || !value->IsObject()) return v8::Local<v8::Object>();
108 return value.As<v8::Object>();
109}
110
111class InspectableHeapObject final : public V8InspectorSession::Inspectable {
112 public:
113 explicit InspectableHeapObject(int heapObjectId)
114 : m_heapObjectId(heapObjectId) {}
115 v8::Local<v8::Value> get(v8::Local<v8::Context> context) override {
116 return objectByHeapObjectId(context->GetIsolate(), m_heapObjectId);
117 }
118
119 private:
120 int m_heapObjectId;
121};
122
123class HeapStatsStream final : public v8::OutputStream {
124 public:
125 explicit HeapStatsStream(protocol::HeapProfiler::Frontend* frontend)
126 : m_frontend(frontend) {}
127
128 void EndOfStream() override {}
129
130 WriteResult WriteAsciiChunk(char* data, int size) override {
131 DCHECK(false);
132 return kAbort;
133 }
134
135 WriteResult WriteHeapStatsChunk(v8::HeapStatsUpdate* updateData,
136 int count) override {
137 DCHECK_GT(count, 0);
138 auto statsDiff = std::make_unique<protocol::Array<int>>();
139 for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
140 statsDiff->emplace_back(updateData[i].index);
141 statsDiff->emplace_back(updateData[i].count);
142 statsDiff->emplace_back(updateData[i].size);
143 }
144 m_frontend->heapStatsUpdate(std::move(statsDiff));
145 return kContinue;
146 }
147
148 private:
149 protocol::HeapProfiler::Frontend* m_frontend;
150};
151
152} // namespace
153
154struct V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::AsyncCallbacks {
155 v8::base::Mutex m_mutex;
156 bool m_canceled = false;
157 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<CollectGarbageCallback>> m_gcCallbacks;
158 std::vector<V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::HeapSnapshotTask*> m_heapSnapshotTasks;
159};
160
161class V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::GCTask : public v8::Task {
162 public:
163 GCTask(v8::Isolate* isolate, std::shared_ptr<AsyncCallbacks> asyncCallbacks)
164 : m_isolate(isolate), m_asyncCallbacks(asyncCallbacks) {}
165
166 void Run() override {
167 std::shared_ptr<AsyncCallbacks> asyncCallbacks = m_asyncCallbacks.lock();
168 if (!asyncCallbacks) return;
169 v8::base::MutexGuard lock(&asyncCallbacks->m_mutex);
170 if (asyncCallbacks->m_canceled) return;
171 v8::debug::ForceGarbageCollection(m_isolate,
172 v8::StackState::kNoHeapPointers);
173 for (auto& callback : asyncCallbacks->m_gcCallbacks) {
174 callback->sendSuccess();
175 }
176 asyncCallbacks->m_gcCallbacks.clear();
177 }
178
179 private:
180 v8::Isolate* m_isolate;
181 std::weak_ptr<AsyncCallbacks> m_asyncCallbacks;
182};
183
184struct V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::HeapSnapshotProtocolOptions {
185 HeapSnapshotProtocolOptions(Maybe<bool> reportProgress,
186 Maybe<bool> treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots,
187 Maybe<bool> captureNumericValue,
188 Maybe<bool> exposeInternals)
189 : m_reportProgress(reportProgress.value_or(false)),
190 m_treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots(treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots.value_or(true)),
191 m_captureNumericValue(captureNumericValue.value_or(false)),
192 m_exposeInternals(exposeInternals.value_or(false)) {}
193 bool m_reportProgress;
194 bool m_treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots;
195 bool m_captureNumericValue;
196 bool m_exposeInternals;
197};
198
199class V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::HeapSnapshotTask : public v8::Task {
200 public:
201 HeapSnapshotTask(V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl* agent,
202 std::shared_ptr<AsyncCallbacks> asyncCallbacks,
203 HeapSnapshotProtocolOptions protocolOptions,
204 std::unique_ptr<TakeHeapSnapshotCallback> callback)
205 : m_agent(agent),
206 m_asyncCallbacks(asyncCallbacks),
207 m_protocolOptions(protocolOptions),
208 m_callback(std::move(callback)) {}
209
210 void Run() override { Run(cppgc::EmbedderStackState::kNoHeapPointers); }
211
212 void Run(cppgc::EmbedderStackState stackState) {
213 Response response = Response::Success();
214 {
215 // If the async callbacks object still exists and is not canceled, then
216 // the V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl still exists, so we can safely take a
217 // snapshot.
218 std::shared_ptr<AsyncCallbacks> asyncCallbacks = m_asyncCallbacks.lock();
219 if (!asyncCallbacks) return;
220 v8::base::MutexGuard lock(&asyncCallbacks->m_mutex);
221 if (asyncCallbacks->m_canceled) return;
222
223 auto& heapSnapshotTasks = asyncCallbacks->m_heapSnapshotTasks;
224 auto it =
225 std::find(heapSnapshotTasks.begin(), heapSnapshotTasks.end(), this);
226 if (it == heapSnapshotTasks.end()) {
227 // This task must have already been run. This can happen because the
228 // task was queued with PostNonNestableTask but then got run early by
229 // takePendingHeapSnapshots.
230 return;
231 }
232 heapSnapshotTasks.erase(it);
233
234 response = m_agent->takeHeapSnapshotNow(m_protocolOptions, stackState);
235 }
236
237 // The rest of this function runs without the mutex, because Node expects to
238 // be able to dispose the profiler agent during the callback, which would
239 // deadlock if this function still held the mutex. It's safe to call the
240 // callback without the mutex; the internal implementation of the callback
241 // uses weak pointers to avoid doing anything dangerous if other components
242 // have been disposed (see DomainDispatcher::Callback::sendIfActive).
243 if (response.IsSuccess()) {
244 m_callback->sendSuccess();
245 } else {
246 m_callback->sendFailure(std::move(response));
247 }
248 }
249
250 private:
251 V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl* m_agent;
252 std::weak_ptr<AsyncCallbacks> m_asyncCallbacks;
253 HeapSnapshotProtocolOptions m_protocolOptions;
254 std::unique_ptr<TakeHeapSnapshotCallback> m_callback;
255};
256
257V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl(
258 V8InspectorSessionImpl* session, protocol::FrontendChannel* frontendChannel,
259 protocol::DictionaryValue* state)
260 : m_session(session),
261 m_isolate(session->inspector()->isolate()),
262 m_frontend(frontendChannel),
263 m_state(state),
264 m_hasTimer(false),
265 m_asyncCallbacks(std::make_shared<AsyncCallbacks>()) {}
266
267V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::~V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl() {
268 v8::base::MutexGuard lock(&m_asyncCallbacks->m_mutex);
269 m_asyncCallbacks->m_canceled = true;
270 m_asyncCallbacks->m_gcCallbacks.clear();
271 m_asyncCallbacks->m_heapSnapshotTasks.clear();
272}
273
274void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::restore() {
275 if (m_state->booleanProperty(HeapProfilerAgentState::heapProfilerEnabled,
276 false))
277 m_frontend.resetProfiles();
278 if (m_state->booleanProperty(
279 HeapProfilerAgentState::heapObjectsTrackingEnabled, false))
280 startTrackingHeapObjectsInternal(m_state->booleanProperty(
281 HeapProfilerAgentState::allocationTrackingEnabled, false));
282 if (m_state->booleanProperty(
283 HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerEnabled, false)) {
284 double samplingInterval = m_state->doubleProperty(
285 HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerInterval, -1);
286 DCHECK_GE(samplingInterval, 0);
287 int flags = m_state->integerProperty(
288 HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerFlags, 0);
289 startSampling(
290 Maybe<double>(samplingInterval),
291 Maybe<bool>(
292 flags &
293 v8::HeapProfiler::kSamplingIncludeObjectsCollectedByMajorGC),
294 Maybe<bool>(
295 flags &
296 v8::HeapProfiler::kSamplingIncludeObjectsCollectedByMinorGC));
297 }
298}
299
300void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::collectGarbage(
301 std::unique_ptr<CollectGarbageCallback> callback) {
302 v8::base::MutexGuard lock(&m_asyncCallbacks->m_mutex);
303 m_asyncCallbacks->m_gcCallbacks.push_back(std::move(callback));
304 v8::debug::GetCurrentPlatform()
305 ->GetForegroundTaskRunner(m_isolate)
306 ->PostNonNestableTask(
307 std::make_unique<GCTask>(m_isolate, m_asyncCallbacks));
308}
309
310Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::startTrackingHeapObjects(
311 Maybe<bool> trackAllocations) {
312 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::heapObjectsTrackingEnabled, true);
313 bool allocationTrackingEnabled = trackAllocations.value_or(false);
314 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::allocationTrackingEnabled,
315 allocationTrackingEnabled);
316 startTrackingHeapObjectsInternal(allocationTrackingEnabled);
317 return Response::Success();
318}
319
320Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::stopTrackingHeapObjects(
321 Maybe<bool> reportProgress, Maybe<bool> treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots,
322 Maybe<bool> captureNumericValue, Maybe<bool> exposeInternals) {
323 requestHeapStatsUpdate();
324 takeHeapSnapshotNow(
325 HeapSnapshotProtocolOptions(
326 std::move(reportProgress), std::move(treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots),
327 std::move(captureNumericValue), std::move(exposeInternals)),
328 cppgc::EmbedderStackState::kMayContainHeapPointers);
329 stopTrackingHeapObjectsInternal();
330 return Response::Success();
331}
332
333Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::enable() {
334 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::heapProfilerEnabled, true);
335 return Response::Success();
336}
337
338Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::disable() {
339 stopTrackingHeapObjectsInternal();
340 if (m_state->booleanProperty(
341 HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerEnabled, false)) {
342 v8::HeapProfiler* profiler = m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler();
343 if (profiler) profiler->StopSamplingHeapProfiler();
344 }
345 m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler()->ClearObjectIds();
346 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::heapProfilerEnabled, false);
347 return Response::Success();
348}
349
350void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::takeHeapSnapshot(
351 Maybe<bool> reportProgress, Maybe<bool> treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots,
352 Maybe<bool> captureNumericValue, Maybe<bool> exposeInternals,
353 std::unique_ptr<TakeHeapSnapshotCallback> callback) {
354 HeapSnapshotProtocolOptions protocolOptions(
355 std::move(reportProgress), std::move(treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots),
356 std::move(captureNumericValue), std::move(exposeInternals));
357 std::shared_ptr<v8::TaskRunner> task_runner =
358 v8::debug::GetCurrentPlatform()->GetForegroundTaskRunner(m_isolate);
359
360 // Heap snapshots can be more accurate if we wait until the stack is empty and
361 // run the garbage collector without conservative stack scanning, as done in
362 // V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::collectGarbage. However, heap snapshots can also
363 // be requested while paused in the debugger, in which case the snapshot must
364 // be taken immediately with conservative stack scanning enabled.
365 if (m_session->inspector()->debugger()->isPaused() ||
366 !task_runner->NonNestableTasksEnabled()) {
367 Response response = takeHeapSnapshotNow(
368 protocolOptions, cppgc::EmbedderStackState::kMayContainHeapPointers);
369 if (response.IsSuccess()) {
370 callback->sendSuccess();
371 } else {
372 callback->sendFailure(std::move(response));
373 }
374 return;
375 }
376
377 std::unique_ptr<HeapSnapshotTask> task = std::make_unique<HeapSnapshotTask>(
378 this, m_asyncCallbacks, protocolOptions, std::move(callback));
379 m_asyncCallbacks->m_heapSnapshotTasks.push_back(task.get());
380 task_runner->PostNonNestableTask(std::move(task));
381}
382
383Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::takeHeapSnapshotNow(
384 const HeapSnapshotProtocolOptions& protocolOptions,
385 cppgc::EmbedderStackState stackState) {
386 v8::HeapProfiler* profiler = m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler();
387 if (!profiler) return Response::ServerError("Cannot access v8 heap profiler");
388 std::unique_ptr<HeapSnapshotProgress> progress;
389 if (protocolOptions.m_reportProgress)
390 progress.reset(new HeapSnapshotProgress(&m_frontend));
391
392 GlobalObjectNameResolver resolver(m_session);
393 v8::HeapProfiler::HeapSnapshotOptions options;
394 options.global_object_name_resolver = &resolver;
395 options.control = progress.get();
396 options.snapshot_mode =
397 protocolOptions.m_exposeInternals ||
398 // Not treating global objects as roots results into exposing
399 // internals.
400 !protocolOptions.m_treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots
401 ? v8::HeapProfiler::HeapSnapshotMode::kExposeInternals
402 : v8::HeapProfiler::HeapSnapshotMode::kRegular;
403 options.numerics_mode =
404 protocolOptions.m_captureNumericValue
405 ? v8::HeapProfiler::NumericsMode::kExposeNumericValues
406 : v8::HeapProfiler::NumericsMode::kHideNumericValues;
407 options.stack_state = stackState;
408 const v8::HeapSnapshot* snapshot = profiler->TakeHeapSnapshot(options);
409 if (!snapshot) return Response::ServerError("Failed to take heap snapshot");
410 HeapSnapshotOutputStream stream(&m_frontend);
411 snapshot->Serialize(&stream);
412 const_cast<v8::HeapSnapshot*>(snapshot)->Delete();
413 return Response::Success();
414}
415
416Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::getObjectByHeapObjectId(
417 const String16& heapSnapshotObjectId, Maybe<String16> objectGroup,
418 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Runtime::RemoteObject>* result) {
419 bool ok;
420 int id = heapSnapshotObjectId.toInteger(&ok);
421 if (!ok) return Response::ServerError("Invalid heap snapshot object id");
422
423 v8::HandleScope handles(m_isolate);
424 v8::Local<v8::Object> heapObject = objectByHeapObjectId(m_isolate, id);
425 if (heapObject.IsEmpty())
426 return Response::ServerError("Object is not available");
427
428 if (!m_session->inspector()->client()->isInspectableHeapObject(heapObject))
429 return Response::ServerError("Object is not available");
430
431 v8::Local<v8::Context> creationContext;
432 if (!heapObject->GetCreationContext().ToLocal(&creationContext)) {
433 return Response::ServerError("Object is not available");
434 }
435 *result = m_session->wrapObject(creationContext, heapObject,
436 objectGroup.value_or(""), false);
437 if (!*result) return Response::ServerError("Object is not available");
438 return Response::Success();
439}
440
441void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::takePendingHeapSnapshots() {
442 // Each task will remove itself from m_heapSnapshotTasks.
443 while (!m_asyncCallbacks->m_heapSnapshotTasks.empty()) {
444 m_asyncCallbacks->m_heapSnapshotTasks.front()->Run(
445 cppgc::EmbedderStackState::kMayContainHeapPointers);
446 }
447}
448
449Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::addInspectedHeapObject(
450 const String16& inspectedHeapObjectId) {
451 bool ok;
452 int id = inspectedHeapObjectId.toInteger(&ok);
453 if (!ok) return Response::ServerError("Invalid heap snapshot object id");
454
455 v8::HandleScope handles(m_isolate);
456 v8::Local<v8::Object> heapObject = objectByHeapObjectId(m_isolate, id);
457 if (heapObject.IsEmpty())
458 return Response::ServerError("Object is not available");
459
460 if (!m_session->inspector()->client()->isInspectableHeapObject(heapObject))
461 return Response::ServerError("Object is not available");
462 m_session->addInspectedObject(
463 std::unique_ptr<InspectableHeapObject>(new InspectableHeapObject(id)));
464 return Response::Success();
465}
466
467Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::getHeapObjectId(
468 const String16& objectId, String16* heapSnapshotObjectId) {
469 v8::HandleScope handles(m_isolate);
470 v8::Local<v8::Value> value;
471 v8::Local<v8::Context> context;
472 Response response =
473 m_session->unwrapObject(objectId, &value, &context, nullptr);
474 if (!response.IsSuccess()) return response;
475 if (value->IsUndefined()) return Response::InternalError();
476
477 v8::SnapshotObjectId id = m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler()->GetObjectId(value);
478 *heapSnapshotObjectId = String16::fromInteger(static_cast<size_t>(id));
479 return Response::Success();
480}
481
482void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::requestHeapStatsUpdate() {
483 HeapStatsStream stream(&m_frontend);
484 v8::SnapshotObjectId lastSeenObjectId =
485 m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler()->GetHeapStats(&stream);
486 m_frontend.lastSeenObjectId(
487 lastSeenObjectId, m_session->inspector()->client()->currentTimeMS());
488}
489
490// static
491void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::onTimer(void* data) {
492 reinterpret_cast<V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl*>(data)->onTimerImpl();
493}
494
495static constexpr v8::base::TimeDelta kDefaultTimerDelay =
496 v8::base::TimeDelta::FromMilliseconds(50);
497
498void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::onTimerImpl() {
499 v8::base::TimeTicks start = v8::base::TimeTicks::Now();
500 requestHeapStatsUpdate();
501 v8::base::TimeDelta elapsed = v8::base::TimeTicks::Now() - start;
502 if (m_hasTimer) {
503 // requestHeapStatsUpdate can take a long time on large heaps. To ensure
504 // that there is still some time for the thread to make progress on running
505 // JavaScript or doing other useful work, we'll adjust the timer delay here.
506 const v8::base::TimeDelta minAcceptableDelay =
507 std::max(elapsed * 2, kDefaultTimerDelay);
508 const v8::base::TimeDelta idealDelay =
509 std::max(elapsed * 3, kDefaultTimerDelay);
510 const v8::base::TimeDelta maxAcceptableDelay =
511 std::max(elapsed * 4, kDefaultTimerDelay);
512 if (m_timerDelayInSeconds < minAcceptableDelay.InSecondsF() ||
513 m_timerDelayInSeconds > maxAcceptableDelay.InSecondsF()) {
514 // The existing timer's speed is not very close to ideal, so cancel it and
515 // start a new timer.
516 m_session->inspector()->client()->cancelTimer(
517 reinterpret_cast<void*>(this));
518 m_timerDelayInSeconds = idealDelay.InSecondsF();
519 m_session->inspector()->client()->startRepeatingTimer(
520 m_timerDelayInSeconds, &V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::onTimer,
521 reinterpret_cast<void*>(this));
522 }
523 }
524}
525
526void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::startTrackingHeapObjectsInternal(
527 bool trackAllocations) {
528 m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler()->StartTrackingHeapObjects(trackAllocations);
529 if (!m_hasTimer) {
530 m_hasTimer = true;
531 m_timerDelayInSeconds = kDefaultTimerDelay.InSecondsF();
532 m_session->inspector()->client()->startRepeatingTimer(
533 m_timerDelayInSeconds, &V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::onTimer,
534 reinterpret_cast<void*>(this));
535 }
536}
537
538void V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::stopTrackingHeapObjectsInternal() {
539 if (m_hasTimer) {
540 m_session->inspector()->client()->cancelTimer(
541 reinterpret_cast<void*>(this));
542 m_hasTimer = false;
543 }
544 m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler()->StopTrackingHeapObjects();
545 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::heapObjectsTrackingEnabled,
546 false);
547 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::allocationTrackingEnabled, false);
548}
549
550Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::startSampling(
551 Maybe<double> samplingInterval,
552 Maybe<bool> includeObjectsCollectedByMajorGC,
553 Maybe<bool> includeObjectsCollectedByMinorGC) {
554 v8::HeapProfiler* profiler = m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler();
555 if (!profiler) return Response::ServerError("Cannot access v8 heap profiler");
556 const unsigned defaultSamplingInterval = 1 << 15;
557 double samplingIntervalValue =
558 samplingInterval.value_or(defaultSamplingInterval);
559 if (samplingIntervalValue <= 0.0) {
560 return Response::ServerError("Invalid sampling interval");
561 }
562 m_state->setDouble(HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerInterval,
563 samplingIntervalValue);
564 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerEnabled,
565 true);
566 int flags = v8::HeapProfiler::kSamplingForceGC;
567 if (includeObjectsCollectedByMajorGC.value_or(false)) {
568 flags |= v8::HeapProfiler::kSamplingIncludeObjectsCollectedByMajorGC;
569 }
570 if (includeObjectsCollectedByMinorGC.value_or(false)) {
571 flags |= v8::HeapProfiler::kSamplingIncludeObjectsCollectedByMinorGC;
572 }
573 m_state->setInteger(HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerFlags, flags);
574 profiler->StartSamplingHeapProfiler(
575 static_cast<uint64_t>(samplingIntervalValue), 128,
576 static_cast<v8::HeapProfiler::SamplingFlags>(flags));
577 return Response::Success();
578}
579
580namespace {
581std::unique_ptr<protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfileNode>
582buildSampingHeapProfileNode(v8::Isolate* isolate,
583 const v8::AllocationProfile::Node* node) {
584 auto children = std::make_unique<
585 protocol::Array<protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfileNode>>();
586 for (const auto* child : node->children)
587 children->emplace_back(buildSampingHeapProfileNode(isolate, child));
588 size_t selfSize = 0;
589 for (const auto& allocation : node->allocations)
590 selfSize += allocation.size * allocation.count;
591 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Runtime::CallFrame> callFrame =
592 protocol::Runtime::CallFrame::create()
593 .setFunctionName(toProtocolString(isolate, node->name))
594 .setScriptId(String16::fromInteger(node->script_id))
595 .setUrl(toProtocolString(isolate, node->script_name))
596 .setLineNumber(node->line_number - 1)
597 .setColumnNumber(node->column_number - 1)
598 .build();
599 std::unique_ptr<protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfileNode> result =
600 protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfileNode::create()
601 .setCallFrame(std::move(callFrame))
602 .setSelfSize(selfSize)
603 .setChildren(std::move(children))
604 .setId(node->node_id)
605 .build();
606 return result;
607}
608} // namespace
609
610Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::stopSampling(
611 std::unique_ptr<protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfile>* profile) {
612 Response result = getSamplingProfile(profile);
613 if (result.IsSuccess()) {
614 m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler()->StopSamplingHeapProfiler();
615 m_state->setBoolean(HeapProfilerAgentState::samplingHeapProfilerEnabled,
616 false);
617 }
618 return result;
619}
620
621Response V8HeapProfilerAgentImpl::getSamplingProfile(
622 std::unique_ptr<protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfile>* profile) {
623 v8::HeapProfiler* profiler = m_isolate->GetHeapProfiler();
624 // Need a scope as v8::AllocationProfile contains Local handles.
625 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
626 std::unique_ptr<v8::AllocationProfile> v8Profile(
627 profiler->GetAllocationProfile());
628 if (!v8Profile)
629 return Response::ServerError("V8 sampling heap profiler was not started.");
630 v8::AllocationProfile::Node* root = v8Profile->GetRootNode();
631 auto samples = std::make_unique<
632 protocol::Array<protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfileSample>>();
633 for (const auto& sample : v8Profile->GetSamples()) {
634 samples->emplace_back(
635 protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfileSample::create()
636 .setSize(sample.size * sample.count)
637 .setNodeId(sample.node_id)
638 .setOrdinal(static_cast<double>(sample.sample_id))
639 .build());
640 }
641 *profile = protocol::HeapProfiler::SamplingHeapProfile::create()
642 .setHead(buildSampingHeapProfileNode(m_isolate, root))
643 .setSamples(std::move(samples))
644 .build();
645 return Response::Success();
646}
